item.title: FLARE: Faithful Logic-Aided Reasoning and Exploration
item.description: FLARE, a novel interpretable approach, leverages LLMs and logic programming to achieve state-of-the-art results in complex reasoning tasks by enhancing model faithfulness and providing insights into r…

item.title: HART: Efficient Visual Generation with Hybrid Autoregressive Transformer
item.description: HART: A hybrid autoregressive transformer achieves state-of-the-art image generation quality at significantly higher speeds than diffusion models, thanks to its innovative hybrid tokenizer and residua…

item.title: Large Language Model Evaluation via Matrix Nuclear-Norm
item.description: Researchers developed Matrix Nuclear-Norm, a fast, accurate LLM evaluation metric that efficiently measures information compression, surpassing the computationally expensive Matrix Entropy.

item.title: Minimum Tuning to Unlock Long Output from LLMs with High Quality Data as the Key
item.description: High-quality data, not sheer volume, is key to unlocking LLMs’ potential for generating long, coherent outputs, as demonstrated by significant performance improvements with minimal tuning.

item.title: Simplifying, Stabilizing and Scaling Continuous-Time Consistency Models
item.description: Researchers stabilize & scale continuous-time consistency models for faster, high-quality image generation, achieving state-of-the-art results on ImageNet.
